meaningMnemonic: As a <radical>hat</radical>, <radical>four people</radical> holding a <radical>cross</radical> use an <kanji>umbrella</kanji>. The umbrella is big enough to be a hat for all four people, so it makes sense. All four of them are religious missionaries, so that’s why they’re holding the cross.
readingMnemonic: You know the Spanish phrase “Mi <reading>casa</reading> (かさ) es su casa”? Well this is kind of like that, but only with a hat. And that hat is an <kanji>umbrella</kanji>. Mi casa es yours too, because it’s an umbrella and also a hat. This makes sense, trust me.
